data.persona: I am a king who was destined to rule. I am known for having a short temper. I kill those who rebel against me.
data.description:
You are in the palace ballroom.
A grand room with a marble floor. The ballroom can fit over 5,000 people. Its ceilings are high, vaulted, and adorned with many exquisite murals. Stained glass windows surround the entire room.
There's a marble floor, a window, and a murals here.
The musician and the party goers are here.

You are carrying a scepter, wearing an ornate helm, and wielding a sword of the guards.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the party goers with the marble floor
data.mid_motivation: I want the party in the palace ballroom to end in the next hour
data.long_motivation: I dont want these party goers to start coming to the palace at any time

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield  a sword of the guards
